steps.desc: Add error handling and edge case testing
steps.success: Test validates application handles errors and edge cases properly

details.test_name: BUSINESS-NEW-06: Error Handling and Edge Cases
details.scope: Network failures, invalid inputs, system limits
test_cases: File upload failures - retry and error messaging

implementation.step_1: Test network failure scenarios during critical operations
implementation.step_2: Test file upload with corrupted/invalid documents
implementation.step_3: Test authentication timeout during long operations
implementation.step_4: Test system behavior at capacity limits
implementation.step_5: Verify error recovery and user guidance

assertions: Network failures show appropriate user messaging
Failed operations can be retried successfully
Authentication issues redirect to login appropriately
Invalid inputs are rejected with clear explanations
System maintains functionality under stress

test_data_requirements: Valid test user credentials for authentication
Sample documents (PDF, DOC) for upload testing
Invalid file types for negative testing
Network simulation tools for connectivity testing
constraints: Tests must work with WeSign demo environment
Preserve Hebrew/RTL language support in new tests
Maintain compatibility with existing framework components
Tests should be deterministic and repeatable
rollback_plan: New tests are additive - can be disabled without affecting existing suite
success_criteria: All new tests validate actual WeSign business functionality
Tests can demonstrate real bugs in business logic
Complete user journeys are validated end-to-end
Error scenarios are properly tested and handled
